title: ama ArmamentHaki

replies.body: I guess I would go for Sabo because he has strong ArmamentHaki.... No, really, he is a cool guy. I also like Zoro when he gets badass and Luffy but it would be too mainstream to just write Luffy

replies.body: Marine? Hm, lets see... Kizaru is kinda cool... Sengoku and and Garp are funny together too. I love Shanks' crew basically because of Lucky Lou, or rather, how I like to call him, "that fat guy". If I had a favourite arc, it would be Marineford, although every arc has really cool things. Oh, and Reunion Arc when they destroy the fake strawhats. Hope I dont spoiler anyone...

I also think light the best logia, logia becomes weak against armament haki so I would probably go for the paramecia type. I like the chop chop fruit a lot, string is OP.... zoan is kinda shitty apart from marco the phoenix and sengoku
